headline: Ford EV Reset Puts Hybrids Front And Center For Future Returns
summary: Ford Motor (NYSE:F) has cancelled its all electric F 150 Lightning pickup, shifting emphasis toward hybrid models and lower cost EVs. The company is recording a one time $19.5b charge tied to this pivot in its EV plans. The move reflects a reset of Ford's EV product roadmap and capital priorities as it reassesses demand for fully electric trucks. Ford Motor, trading around $13.8 per share, is making this EV reset after a period of strong longer term share price performance, including a...
